Plot: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.
Title: The Secret in Their Eyes
Writer: Eduardo Sacheri, Juan José Campanella, Eduardo Sacheri (novel)
Actors: Soledad Villamil, Ricardo Darín, Carla Quevedo, Pablo Rago
tomatoConsensus: Unpredictable and rich with symbolism, this Argentinian murder mystery lives up to its Oscar with an engrossing plot, Juan Jose Campanella's assured direction, and mesmerizing performances from its cast.
